subject: krb5_abortx()
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Hi Love, hi Andrew,

I just noticed we panic on some older platforms
(HP-UX and Solaris) because seed_something() in
krb5_generate_random_block() fails, it would be cool
if this could be fixed...

metze
